title: Sort an Array
content:
Given an array of integers nums, sort the array in ascending order.

 

Example 1:

Input: nums = [5,2,3,1]
Output: [1,2,3,5]

Example 2:

Input: nums = [5,1,1,2,0,0]
Output: [0,0,1,1,2,5]

 

Constraints:

  • 1 <= nums.length <= 50000
  • -50000 <= nums[i] <= 50000
